errors.loadMoreMatches: Unable to load more matches. Please try again.

hero.title: Track scores across multiple sports, run tournaments, and crown the Master of All
hero.subtitle: See how Cross Sport Tracker keeps every league organised with one set of tools.
hero.supportingCopy: Jump into the story, then launch a demo sandbox to explore without setting anything up.

Home.sportsError: Unable to load sports. Check connection.
Home.matchesError: Unable to load matches. Check connection.

errors.load: Failed to load matches. Try again later.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to view these matches.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session expired. Please refresh and try again.

Landing.title: Track scores across multiple sports, run tournaments, and crown the Master of All
Landing.subtitle: Unify match recording, rankings, and tournaments with a single toolkit that your club can run in an afternoon.
Landing.supportingCopy: Purpose-built for clubs that juggle padel, bowling, tennis, disc golf, and more.
Landing.featureHeading: Why teams choose Cross Sport Tracker

multiSport.title: Truly multi-sport
multiSport.body: Padel on Monday, disc golf on Friday. Configure formats, rulesets, and scoring to fit every code.

tournaments.title: Run brackets and ladders
tournaments.body: Spin up tournaments with elimination brackets, bronze finals, and rolling ladders without spreadsheets.

leaderboards.title: Crown the Master of All
leaderboards.body: Blend results across sports, keep rivalries alive, and reward all-rounders with shared leaderboards.

notifications.title: Keep everyone synced
notifications.body: Localized emails, reminders, and status updates make sure no one misses their next showdown.

Landing.workflowHeading: From first serve to season champion
Landing.workflowBody: Cross Sport Tracker captures every rally, keeps tournaments on time, and celebrates the all-rounder who conquers every bracket.

workflowItems.capture: Record multi-sport results with guardrails for rulesets and tiebreaks.
workflowItems.manage: Coordinate brackets, bronze finals, and ladders without manual spreadsheets.
workflowItems.share: Publish leaderboards instantly so everyone knows who is chasing Master of All.

Demo.title: Jump into the demo
Demo.subtitle: We preloaded a fictional club so you can explore matches, ladders, and leaderboards instantly.
Demo.loaded: Demo data loaded. Scroll through tournaments, matches, and leaders below.
Demo.supportingCopy: Refresh the sandbox anytime to explore a new set of fictional results.
Demo.sportBlurb: Configured rules, players, and formats so you can preview the experience.

club.label: Played at club
club.hint: Select the club where the match was played, or leave blank if it wasn't at a club.
club.homeSelected: Using your home club from your player profile.

friendly.label: Mark as friendly
friendly.hint: Friendly matches appear in match history but do not impact leaderboards or player statistics.

hints.save: Save once each side has at least one player and completed sets are entered as needed.

messages.padelAmericanoSaved: Padel Americano tie saved. Update the players and scores to record the next tie.

bowling.rollPlaceholder: Pins or symbols (e.g. X for strikes, / for spares, – for gutters)

discGolf.title: Record Disc Golf
discGolf.setupDescription: Start a new match or choose an existing disc golf match before recording hole scores.

states.noMatch: Select players and start a new match or choose an existing disc golf match to begin recording scores.

errors.matchDetails: Unable to load match details. Please try again.
errors.selectPlayers: Select at least one player for each side.
errors.uniquePlayers: Players cannot appear on multiple sides: {players}.
errors.holeCount: Enter a valid hole count between 1 and {max}.
errors.parValues: Enter a positive par value for each hole.
errors.strokeCounts: Enter stroke counts for both sides.

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save match. Please try again.
errors.saveOffline: Unable to save while offline. Check your connection and try again.

padelAmericano.tieTargetHint: Total points on offer in the tie. Common picks: 16 (four serves each pair), 24 (six serves), or 32 (eight serves).
padelAmericano.tieTargetRequired: Pop in a positive tie target before saving your padel Americano tie.
padelAmericano.tieTargetMismatchPrefix: Padel Americano totals need to match your tie target of
